experience: You and Michael J both know Sean Sheppard, Chris Cox, and 35 others
Anaplan included on Deloitte’s 2017 Technology Fast 500™ list of fastest-growing companies in North America | Anaplan

Global Head of Talent Acquisition at AnaplanLead the Global Talent Acquisition team to achieve aggressive hiring targets and grow Anaplan. Anaplan is making the world better by connecting organizations and people to make informed decisions. Large and fast-growing organizations use Anaplan’s cloud platform in every business function to make informed decisions and drive faster, more effective planning processes. Anaplan is a privately held company based in San Francisco with 16 offices and 700 employees worldwide. To learn more, visit anaplan.com.
NetSuite Inc. is an American cloud computing company based in San Mateo, California, that sells a group of software services used to manage a business's financials, operations and customer relations.

Zenefits is a one stop HR platform that manages everything associated with HR, including payroll and taxes, benefits and insurance, and HR reporting. Essentially, we centralize and simplify all the boring, disjointed, paper-centric HR stuff that no one wants to deal with, into a very easy, streamlined, elegant platform. And the best part: our software is FREE.
Vice President and Global Lead, Talent Acquisition, SAP

Led Talent Acquisition globally for SAP. Obsessively focused on candidate quality, hiring manager satisfaction, candidate experience, and enabling our world class recruiters. Over 15K hires globally in 2014, a 110% increase year over year. 69 hires per FTE, vs 50 in 2013 and 46 in 2012. Led the integration and merging of three TA orgs (SAP, SuccessFactors and Ariba), with three different systems and processes, into one unified global team. Rebuilt and centralized the global sourcing org, lowering cost and increasing production. Built "License to Recruit" program: rolled out an annual interview training and pitch certification project to “license” managers and recruiters to interview properly and effectively, enabling better hiring decisions. Rebuilt and reestablished a strong presence on social. Built new sourcing channels and increased career site traffic by 4x. Established first in-house video production team within SAP TA. Career site redesign – mobile friendly, simple and bold, more engaging dynamic content.

Global VP of Recruiting for all of the Cloud for SAP.SuccessFactors is the leading provider of cloud-based Business Execution Software, and delivers business alignment, team execution, people performance, and learning management solutions to organizations of all sizes across more than 60 industries. With approximately 15 million subscription seats globally, we strive to delight our customers by delivering innovative solutions, content and analytics, process expertise and best practices insights from serving our broad and diverse customer base. Today, we have more than 3,500 customers in more than 168 countries using our application suite in 35 languages.

Director Of Recruiting at TenFold
December 17, 2014, Chris reported directly to Michael J

I had the great pleasure of working for Mike at SuccessFactors / SAP.  Mike's passion for recruiting is focused around driving his team to deliver the best, passive talent while providing world class candidate experiences and exceeding all hiring manager expectations.  The culture Mike set for us at SuccessFactors was the best I have ever worked in.  He is there when we need him for guidance and mentoring, yet also trusts his team to deliver and exceed every goal set.  Mike is an inspirational leader and not only can drive the overall strategy of the team, but always willing and ready to jump into the trenches with his team to help us execute.  I highly recommend Mike and would love to work for him again someday.

Mark Souter
HR Product Sales & Strategy Lead at ServiceNow | HR Director | HR Tech | @MarkSouterLive | J.P. | Employee Experience |
January 9, 2013, Michael J was senior to Mark but didn’t manage directly

Mike is a truly global, trusted recruiting leader. It’s obvious Mike has an extensive background & understanding of pragmatic recruiting approaches that work, but it’s his skill & ability to lead & deliver meaningful results for the business through a diverse, talented & geographically-wide team that sets Mike apart. I have seen Mike grow further in his leadership capacity over this last 18 months or so – he has a teachable mindset & not only welcomes, but applies, constructive feedback. His ability to lead can not only be demonstrated in the huge delivery of growing the business with fantastic talent for SuccessFactors, but his team just love & support him like few others. Mike gives his team the opportunity to make the roles their own & be legendary, but equally, he is fair & holds people in his team to account. Mike is a great guy to work with, bringing humour & stories that make coming to work fun. He has a very warm, collaborative style, with a high degree of transparency that is not altogether common. I, as well as the wider talent team, like Mike a lot. It is hard not to!

I have worked with Mike on the EMEA recruitment efforts for several months. Recruiting Director
September 24, 2015, Michael J managed Christina directly

I had the good fortune of working w/ Christina during my entire tenure at SuccessFactors/SAP. She was easily one of my most important team members and always did a great job of making me look good, a key skill set for anyone on my teams :).She is incredibly reliable, execution-oriented, and self sufficient, and she's kick ass leader. Her people trust her and love working for her, and work hard for her. She's a voice of reason that I relied on for input and advice - she was a trusted advisor for many decisions. I knew when I gave something to Christina she would crush it. She led various recruiting teams and those were always high performing. She led recruiting efforts in the US and globally. She pivoted into a Project Manager role leading a major global initiative to get SAP onto SuccessFactors' cloud based ATS...no small feat. It was highly, highly complex, with many stakeholders all over the world, many road blocks and red tape, and she navigated through it all beautifully, and they got it done. I rank Christina as among the best I've ever worked with. She's awesome.

summary: Experienced recruiting executive with expertise transforming large scale, global recruiting orgs, as well as building TA orgs from the ground up for high growth start ups. Current: Lead global recruiting for Anaplan, a cloud platform solution that enables all sized businesses, in every business function, to make informed decisions and drive faster, more effective planning processes. Anaplan is currently at 700 employees globally in 16 offices worldwide.Prior experience :NetSuite / Oracle:Global VP for the leading provider of cloud-based financials / ERP and omnichannel commerce software suites. Lead a recruiting team of 100+ globally to support a hiring demand of over 2K hires per year. Zenefits:Built and led recruiting for Zenefits, the fastest growing SaaS company in history at the time. Grew the recruiting team from 5 to 55 recruiters, as hiring increased to a peak of 1800 hires in 2015. Built recruiting processes and operations from scratch. SAP:Led the global TA function for this 75K employee company. Led a recruiting team of 300+ globally that yielded 15K hires annually. Drove a major org and budget overhaul that resulted in a centralized, efficient, scalable, operationally sound recruiting model. Yielded large budget savings while increasing production per recruiter and quality of hire.
